Traits.Name: Aura of Misfortune
Traits.Content: Creatures within 30 feet of Black Shuck have disadvantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Traits.Name: Flaming Fury
Traits.Content: When Black Shuck is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes in a burst of flames, dealing 4d6 fire damage to all creatures within 10 feet.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The creature makes two attacks: one with its Bite and one with its Burning Embrace.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage, plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

Actions.Name: Burning Embrace
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d6 + 4 + 2d6) fire damage and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become blinded until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Cursed Howl
Actions.Content: The Hound of Dead unleashes a terrifying howl. Each creature of its choice within 30 feet must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature fails this saving throw, it takes 12 (2d12) necrotic damage and must immediately use its reaction to move as far away from Black Shuck as possible.
